backend/main.mo: Main Motoko actor for the question paper generation system, implementing user profile management, subject CRUD, question bank operations, and paper generation with role-based access control via AccessControl and MixinAuthorization mixins.
feature_evidence.json: Empty feature evidence report JSON file with no recorded features.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: JSON document summarizing all frontend source files, describing the purpose and key fixes applied to each component, page, hook, and utility in the project.
frontend/index.css: Global CSS file that sets up Tailwind base/components/utilities and defines CSS custom properties for light and dark theme color tokens.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point for the frontend app, mounting the React root div and loading the main TypeScript module with the title 'Automatic Question Paper Generation System'.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React component that configures TanStack Router with all application routes and wraps the app in a QueryClientProvider, using an AuthGuardedLayout to redirect unauthenticated users to the Login page.
frontend/src/components/EditQuestionModa: Modal dialog component for editing an existing question, with form fields for text, category, difficulty, and MCQ options/answer, using the useUpdateQuestion hook to persist changes.
frontend/src/components/Layout.tsx: Sidebar layout component providing navigation links, user principal display, and a sign-out button, branded as 'Automatic Question Paper Generation System'.
frontend/src/components/PaperCard.tsx: Card component that displays a generated paper's subject name, creation date, exam duration, and total marks, with a button to navigate to the paper preview page.
frontend/src/components/PaperSection.tsx: Renders a section of an exam paper with a title, list of numbered questions, and marks summary. Displays MCQ options in a grid layout when applicable.
frontend/src/components/QuestionCard.tsx: Displays a single question with its subject, category, and difficulty badges, plus expand/collapse for MCQ options and edit/delete action buttons.
frontend/src/components/StatsCard.tsx: A simple display card showing a statistic with an icon, title, and count, styled with a gradient background.
frontend/src/components/SubjectManager.t: Manages CRUD operations for subjects, providing dialogs to add, edit, and delete subjects with form validation and error handling.
Renders a horizontal step-by-step workflow diagram showing the 5-step process from adding subjects to downloading PDFs.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and caches an ICP backend actor using the current Internet Identity, initializing access control and invalidating dependent queries when the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides an Internet Identity authentication context with login, logout, and status tracking via an AuthClient, exposed through a React context and hook.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for all backend CRUD operations on subjects and questions, including bulk upload, wrapping actor calls with cache invalidation.
frontend/src/index.css: Global CSS file that imports Poppins and Inter fonts, sets up Tailwind directives, and defines CSS custom properties for a navy blue academic theme including light/dark mode tokens, sidebar variables, and utility classes.
frontend/src/main.tsx: React app entry point that wraps the App component with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider before mounting to the DOM.
frontend/src/pages/AddQuestion.tsx: Page component for adding exam questions individually or via bulk CSV/JSON upload, with form validation, file parsing, preview, and submission to the backend.
frontend/src/pages/Dashboard.tsx: Main dashboard page displaying a welcome banner, stats cards for subjects/questions/papers, a workflow diagram, and a list of recently generated papers.
frontend/src/pages/GeneratedPapers.tsx: Page that lists all previously generated exam papers sorted by creation date, with loading and empty states and a button to generate a new paper.
frontend/src/pages/GeneratePaper.tsx: Page component for configuring and generating an exam paper by selecting a subject and specifying question counts per category, with availability validation before submission.
frontend/src/pages/Login.tsx: Login page featuring a branding panel with feature highlights and an Internet Identity sign-in button for teacher authentication.
frontend/src/pages/PaperPreview.tsx: Displays a preview of a generated exam paper by fetching paper, question, and subject data, organizing questions into sections by category, and providing a PDF download button with variant selection.
frontend/src/pages/QuestionBank.tsx: Renders the Question Bank page with tabbed views for questions and subjects, supporting search and filter by subject, category, and difficulty, with delete functionality.
frontend/src/utils/csvParser.ts: Parses CSV text into structured question objects, validating required fields, category/difficulty mappings, and marks consistency, returning parsed questions and error messages.
frontend/src/utils/csvTemplate.ts: Generates and triggers a browser download of a sample CSV template file with example question rows for bulk question import.
frontend/src/utils/docxParser.ts: Empty file with no implemented content.
frontend/src/utils/docxTemplate.ts: Empty file with no implemented content.
frontend/src/utils/jsonParser.ts: Parses a JSON string array into Question objects, validating required fields, category/difficulty enums, and MCQ-specific requirements, returning questions and error messages.
frontend/src/utils/pdfGenerator.ts: Generates a printable HTML exam paper document from structured section and question data, opening it in a new window for PDF printing.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides utility functions for reading URL query parameters (including hash-based routing), persisting them to sessionStorage, and cleaning sensitive params from the URL hash.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration enabling dark mode, custom fonts (Inter, Poppins), an extended color palette using CSS variables (oklch/hsl), custom border radii, box shadows, and keyframe animations for the frontend.
project_state.json: Tracks project state and pending feature requests, specifically: adding a 'subject' field (AR-1), removing the admin-only restriction on subject creation in the backend (AR-2), and updating the SubjectManager frontend to show the Add Subject form to Teacher users (AR-3).
